about_the_game:
Chewller Apocalypse in Virtual Reality!

The Chewllers is a first-person shooter designed exclusively for virtual reality, where the player is immersed in a post-apocalyptic world full of post-apocalyptic Chewllers.

CHEWLLERS

There are different types of Chewllers in the game. They are distinguished from each other by their funny behaviors and abilities.


  • Basic Chewller
  • Roller
  • Kamikaze
  • Flying
  • Shooter
  • Support
  • Thief
  • Dino Rider
  • Dragon
  • Beetle
  • Boss

Each requires an individual approach. The harder it is to deal with monsters, the greater the chance of them dropping resources, items, and chests.

WEAPONS


In the game, you will find primary and secondary weapons. The main weapon that the player constantly has is upgrading up to 5 Lvl. As for secondary weapons, there are 6 types of weapons that are functionally different from each other and have different roles All secondary weapons are upgraded up to 3 Lvl.

  • Sniper
  • Shotgun
  • Crossbow
  • Grenade launcher
  • Machine gun
  • Potato Catapult

THROWABLE ITEMS

There are 7 types of items available from which the player can make a bunch of weird and practical combinations of throwables. Creativity is the limit. Each of them has its own significance and uniqueness in various cases.

  • Pumpkin
  • Paint spray
  • Grenade
  • Fuel tank
  • Sensor
  • Perfume
  • Poison flask

GAME MODES



  • SinglePlayer Campaign
Game built from all existing locations of virtual reality, which creates a lot of challenges, where you can complete additional tasks, receive new rewards and improve progress.

  • MultiPlayer Campaign
Play with friends, Join forces in the co-op mode, create your own unique strategies, overcome new location challenges and become the Chewller Slayer! But keep in mind: the more chewing items the base consists of, the more exciting the Chewllers are.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 8GB GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti / AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: The Chewllers is a multiplayer, VR game, where 4 players protect the tower from monsters in Co-op mode. You can fight against monsters in different ways, create your own crafted tools, or use existing explosive devices.
